page.title: 06FARM EQUIPMENT IN POLWARTH
page.content: MACHINERY ON MARCHMONT FARMS CONSISTS OF 2 COMBINES & 8 TRACTORS TOGETHER WITH ALL THE NECESSARY CULTIVATION EQUIPMENT. THERE IS A WORKSHOP WHERE ALL THESE ARE MAINTAINED &/OR MENDED OR MODIFIED. TRAILERS ARE MADE THERE & FARM GATES, PARTICULARLY THE DOUBLE ONES REQUIRED BY THE WIDTH OF SOME MACHINERY, FOR OWN & OUTSIDE USE. A GRAIN DRYER WAS INSTALLED 2 YEARS AGO SO THAT THE FARM CAN DRY ITS OWN GRAIN & SEED & THAT OF OTHERS. VERY LARGE BARNS WERE BUILT TO HOUSE CONSIDERABLE QUANTITIES OF GRAIN BELONGING TO THE FARM ITSELF & TO OTHERS. ONE OF THE BIG BARNS HAS A RADIO MAST SO THAT RADIO CONTACT CAN BE MADE WITH VARIOUS VEHICLES THROUGHOUT THE ESTATE. RECENTLY A COMPUTER HAS BEEN INSTALLED FOR MORE EFFICIENT MANAGEMENT & ACCOUNTING.
